title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file, the JAR packager incorrectly reports that the creation has failed due to unsaved editors. This occurs when the 'Finish' button is pressed. The error message displayed is 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late and displays an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' when attempting to create a JAR file.
EB: The JAR packager should not report unsaved editors as the reason for JAR creation failure if all files have been saved.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the JAR packager. 
2. Add some files to be included in the JAR file. 
3. Ensure all editors are saved. 
4. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file. 
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' being displayed, indicating JAR creation failure due to unsaved editors.
